Title: Farewell My Concubine
Writer: Pik-Wah Lee (novel), Pik-Wah Lee (screenplay), Wei Lu
Actors: Leslie Cheung, Fengyi Zhang, Li Gong, You Ge
Plot: Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and will endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 25 wins & 10 nominations.
